1370: Vandelghis moved to Cingel.C.6 after marriage.
Got married to Hildegardis at age 26 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Nellen, at age 26.
1373: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Marisseis, at age 29.
1375: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Nannen, at age 31.
1378: Had a son with Hildegardis, Gelmarus, at age 34.
1379: Lost daughter Nellen when Nellen was 10 years old.
1383: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Kerstine, at age 39.
1385: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Flore, at age 41.
1389: Lost son Gelmarus when Gelmarus was 12 years old.
1394: Had a son with Hildegardis, Willai, at age 50.
